Uses of Interface
org.atmosphere.vibe.server.ServerSocket

    • Uses of ServerSocket in org.atmosphere.vibe.server

      Methods in org.atmosphere.vibe.server that return ServerSocket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerSocket ServerSocket.closeAction(org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<Void> action)
      Executed if the socket is closed for any reason.
      ServerSocket ServerSocket.errorAction(org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<Throwable> action)
      Executed if there was any error on the socket.
      <T> ServerSocket ServerSocket.off(String event, org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<T> action)
      Removes a given event handler for a given event.
      <T> ServerSocket ServerSocket.on(String event, org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<T> action)
      Adds a given event handler for a given event.
      <T> ServerSocket ServerSocket.send(String event, Object data, org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<T> resolved)
      Sends a given event with data attaching resolved callback.
      <T,U> ServerSocket ServerSocket.send(String event, Object data, org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<T> resolved, org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<U> rejected)
      Sends a given event with data attaching resolved callback and rejected callback.

      Executes the given action retrieving every socket in this server.

      Server Server.socketAction(org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.action.Action<ServerSocket> action)
